alert.note: Alert for Rusk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 14 at 9:00AM CST until December 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and mixed precipitation will wind down late this morning. Light mixed precipitation this evening will give way to snow overnight, which will continue into Thursday, with accumulations of more than 6 inches expected. * WHERE...Rusk County. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 9 PM this evening to 6 PM CST Thursday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
